panels.content:
# COVID-19 – Romanian Economic Impact Monitor
## Impact of the coronavirus pandemic on the Romanian economy: facts and forecasts
RO  HU  EN
57days passed since the first coronavirus case in Romania

Professional studies on the economic impact of the coronavirus pandemic in Romania, carried out by researchers of the Faculty of Economics and Business Administration of the Babeș-Bolyai University (Cluj-Napoca, Romania). The pandemic is primarily a global challenge which greatly affects the Romanian society and economy as well. The purpose of our website is to offer support for economic and policy decision makers in Romania by providing a precise and regularly updated analysis of the current situation, and by offering background studies for the development of forecasting scenarios with the aim to better protect society, employees, companies and supply chains.

panels.content:
Stock market reactions

The main developed and regional stock market index closing prices, returns and volatility. The corresponding values for the critical period of the 2008 crisis for comparison (starting dates 📆 2008-09-16 and 2020-02-26 📆).

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "base"."stocks1" WHERE ("lang" =~ /^$lang$/ AND ("stock" = 'Bid/ask 10 ev (%)' OR "stock" = 'Bid/ask 5 ev (%)' OR "stock" = 'Bid/ask 3 ev (%)' OR "stock" = 'Bid/ask 12 honap (%)' OR "stock" = 'Bid/ask 6 honap (%)')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "langstock" fill(null)
